name: UInstancedStaticMeshComponent
doc: A component that efficiently renders multiple instances of the same StaticMesh.

PerInstanceSMCustomData:
Array of custom data for instances. This will contains NumCustomDataFloats*InstanceCount entries. The entries are represented sequantially, in instance order. Can be read in a material and manipulated through Blueprints.
    Example: If NumCustomDataFloats is 1, then each entry will belong to an instance. Custom data 0 will belong to Instance 0. Custom data 1 will belong to Instance 1 etc.
    Example: If NumCustomDataFloats is 2, then each pair of sequential entries belong to an instance. Custom data 0 and 1 will belong to Instance 0. Custom data 2 and 3 will belong to Instance 2 etc.
InstancingRandomSeed:
Value used to seed the random number stream that generates random numbers for each of this mesh's instances.
      The random number is stored in a buffer accessible to materials through the PerInstanceRandom expression. If
      this is set to zero (default), it will be populated automatically by the editor.
InstanceLODDistanceScale:
Scale applied to change the computation of LOD distances when using the StaticMesh screen sizes.
Smaller values make LODs transition earlier.
InstanceStartCullDistance: Distance from camera at which each instance begins to fade out.
InstanceEndCullDistance: Distance from camera at which each instance completely fades out.
bUseGpuLodSelection: If true, this component will use GPU LOD selection.

methods.name: AddInstance
methods.doc: Add an instance to this component. Transform is given in local space of this component unless bWorldSpace is set.

methods.name: AddInstances
methods.doc: Add multiple instances to this component. Transform is given in local space of this component unless bWorldSpace is set.

methods.name: BatchUpdateInstancesTransform
BatchUpdateInstancesTransforms
ClearInstances
methods.doc: Clear all instances being rendered by this component.

methods.name: GetCullDistances
methods.doc: Gets the fading start and culling end distances for this component.

methods.name: GetInstanceCount
methods.doc: Get the number of instances in this component.

methods.name: GetInstancesOverlappingBox
methods.doc: Returns the instances with instance bounds overlapping the specified box. The return value is an array of instance indices.

methods.name: GetInstancesOverlappingSphere
methods.doc: Returns the instances with instance bounds overlapping the specified sphere. The return value is an array of instance indices.

methods.name: GetInstanceTransform
methods.doc: Get the transform for the instance specified. Instance is returned in local space of this component unless bWorldSpace is set.  Returns True on success.

methods.name: IsValidInstance
methods.doc: Does the given index map to a valid instance in this component?

methods.name: RemoveInstance
methods.doc: Remove the instance specified. Returns True on success.

methods.name: RemoveInstances
methods.doc: Remove the instances specified. Returns True on success.

methods.name: SetCullDistances
methods.doc: Sets the fading start and culling end distances for this component.

methods.name: SetCustomDataValue
methods.doc: Update custom data for specific instance

methods.name: SetNumCustomDataFloats
methods.doc: Update number of custom data entries per instance. This applies to all instances and will reallocate the full custom data buffer and reset all values to 0

methods.name: UpdateInstanceTransform
